title: Stream-Mediator
h1.title: Stream-Mediator
message.first: Logon with your name, alias or pseudonym together with a shared session-name.
menu.end_all_streams.tooltip: Stops all streams and closes the web-socket-connection.
menu.add_peer.tooltip: Adds a video-box to request the stream of a another peer.
menu.videobox_local.tooltip: Opens a video-box of the local camera.
menu.share_screen.tooltip: Opens a video-box for sharing a local window or the whole local screen.
menu.textchat.tooltip: Opens a box containing a text-chat with all peers.
menu.requestbox.tooltip: Opens a video-box to request the stream of a peer. This can be used if a peer wants to share its screen.
menu.messages.tooltip: Shows a history of all messages.
p.documentation_doc01: The Stream-Mediator is a demonstration of WebRTC. It can be used for video-chats between two or more users. A modern browser is needed only. The communication is "peer to peer" between the users. After initialisation of the WebRTC-connection there is a end-to-end encryption. The Session Traversal Utilities for NAT (STUN) is used for traversal of NAT gateways. There are limitations:
li.documentation_doc02: In large firms there are proxy servers which may filter the network communication between internet and local network
li.documentation_doc03: There may be providers or routers which don't support STUN.
p.documentation_doc04: There are websites on troubleshooting WebRTC. In many cases a TURN server would help but a that wouldn't be "peer to peer" any more.'
p.documentation_us01: Important is a consensus on the same session. The server gives an advice of a session.
p.documentation_us02: All peers are equal, there is no administrator of the session. Because of privacy the user of a session will be not listed. A stream of a peer is added after confirmation only.
p.documentation_us03: You may add a chat-window (see the menu), its messages are transferred from peer to peer.
Error in the page's HTML-code: #message: Error in the page's HTML-code: #message or #menu is missing.
Öffne zunächst ein eigenes Fenster (Vide: Open your own (video-)box first (video-box, screen-sharing oder request-box)
Gib zunächst Deinen eigenen Namen bzw. D: In the first step enter your name, alias or pseudonym.
Im Feld &bdquo;Dein Name&ldquo; wird der: In the field "Your name" should contain your name, alias or pseudonym.
Im Feld &bdquo;Teilnehmer&ldquo; wird de: In the field "Participant" you should enter the name, alias or pseudonym of your peer.
Anmeldung am Server und Wahl eines eigen: Logon and choice of own screen or window
Gegenseite zwecks Fenster-Teilen anrufen: Call peer for sharing a screen or window
Gegenseite zwecks Textchat-Teilen anrufe: Call peer for sharing a text-chat
Anmeldung am Server ohne (weitere) eigen: Logon at the server without own content
Gegenseite zwecks Video- oder Fenster-Te: Call peer for sharing a video-chat or screen or window
Anmeldung am Server und Aktivieren der e: Logon and activation of own camera
Dieses Videofenster eine Ebene hoch schi: Raise this video-box one layer upwards.
Dieses Videofenster eine Ebene runter sc: Sink this video-box one layer downwards.
Increase the size of this video-box.
Decrease the size of this video-box.
Ein eigenes Fenster (Videofenster, Fenst: An own video-box (video-chat, screen-/window-sharing or request-box) is missing.
Der Name $1 wird für den Verbindungsaufb: The name $1 is needed for connection-initialisation.
VideoBox $1 („$2“) hat die unterste Eben: Video-box $1 ("$2") has reached the bottom layer.
Choose your own name, alias or pseudonym, please.
Zum Namen „$1“ wurde keine Video-Box gef: There is no video-box corresponding to the name "$1".
Der ICE-Handshake mit $1 war nicht erfol: The ICE-handshake with "$1" was not erfolgreich.
The video-call of "$1" has been answered.
Logoff at the server will be called.
Eine junge Verbindung zum Server wurde u: The connection to the server has been closed. Maybe the server is overloaded.
Nachricht vom Typ \"$1\" kann wegen fehl: Can't send message of type "$1" because of missing connection to the server.
Zum Senden einer Nachricht per Chatbox m: Sending a message via chat-box requires a connection to a peer, e.g. via video-chat, sharing a screen/window or request-box.
Anmeldung mit einem Namen oder Pseudonym: Logon with your name, alias or pseudonym and a common session-id.
Login ok. Die Verbindung mit anderen Use: Logon successful. You can contact other users of this session now.
Relogin ok. Die Verbindung wurde wieder: Relogin ok. The connection is recuperated.
Der Server konnte Argumente des Requests: Der Server konnte Argumente des Requests nicht erfolgreich verarbeiten.
Der Server konnte den Request nicht erfo: The server couldn't process the request successfully.
handleRouting: Der gewählte Teilnehmer i: The chosen peer is not known in the session.
handleRouting: Teilnehmer konnte nicht e: The chosen peer couldn't be reached'.
